Text: I don't know why it says, subtitles included. As there are no subtitles to this film. I downloaded it and burned it to a dvd and found out that only about two minutes are spoken in english.

there are english subttitles LOL they are just not named the same as the movie so it might be reason why ur dvd player didnt see them ... but they are ... definitely just dl this
